pictograms.label: Remove
pictograms.description: Any type of removal from vehicle (unscrew, drive out, etc.).

pictograms.label: Install
pictograms.description: Any type of installation on vehicle (bolt on, fit, etc.).

pictograms.label: Disassemble
pictograms.description: Disassemble component for cleaning, checking, etc.

pictograms.label: Assemble
pictograms.description: Assemble component after completing operational check.

pictograms.label: Clean
pictograms.description:
To ensure correct operation or decrease wear (bearing or sealing
surfaces, etc.).

pictograms.label: Inspect
pictograms.description:
Check component for correct operation and wear. Check fluid
level and correct if necessary.

pictograms.label: Measure
pictograms.description:
Check that components, temperature, pressure, etc. conform to
the specified values.

pictograms.label: Adjust
pictograms.description: All adjusting work according to specifications.
